title: Personal Identity Questionnaire
description: This questionnaire measures your personality traits and values. Please rate each item on a 1-7 scale based on how much you agree.

sections.title: BFI-2-S Personality Inventory
sections.instruction: Read each statement and rate how well it describes you.

questions.text: I am outgoing and enthusiastic.
I feel sympathy and kindness toward others.
I like to keep things organized and tidy.
I tend to worry a lot.
I enjoy thinking deeply about complex problems.
I tend to dominate and take charge of others.
I am respectful and polite to others.
I tend to get tasks done efficiently.
I often feel depressed and blue.
I am imaginative and creative.
I am active and full of energy.
I believe that most people are basically good.
I am reliable and can always be counted on.
I am moody and have mood swings.
I am very interested in art and beauty.
I am quiet and shy.
I am indifferent and cold toward others.
I am messy and disorganized.
I am generally relaxed and not easily stressed.
I have little interest in abstract or theoretical ideas.
I let others take charge and lead.
I tend to be rude and impolite to others.
I tend to procrastinate and slack off.
I am emotionally stable and not easily upset.
I have few artistic or creative interests.
I am lethargic and slow-paced.
I tend to be suspicious of others' intentions.
I am sometimes irresponsible and unreliable.
I am emotionally stable and my mood doesn't change easily.
I am not interested in art or aesthetic experiences.

sections.title: PVQ Values Questionnaire
sections.instruction: Here are brief descriptions of different people. Please read each description and rate how much each person is like you.

questions.text: Thinking up new ideas and being creative is important to this person. This person likes to do things in their own original way.
It is important to this person to be rich. This person wants to have a lot of money and expensive things.
It is important to this person that every person in the world have equal opportunities. This person believes everyone should have a chance in life.
It is important to this person to show their abilities. This person wants people to admire what they do.
It is important to this person to live in secure surroundings. This person avoids anything that might endanger their safety.
This person likes surprises and is always looking for new things to do. This person thinks it is important to do lots of different things in life.
It is important to this person always to behave properly. This person wants to avoid doing anything people would say is wrong.
Tradition is important to this person. This person tries to follow the customs handed down by their religion or family.
It is important to this person to help the people around them. This person wants to care for their well-being.
Having a good time is important to this person. This person likes to 'spoil' themselves.
It is important to this person to make their own decisions about what they do. This person likes to be free and not depend on others.
It is important to this person to care for nature and the environment. This person wants to protect the natural world.
It is important to this person to lead others. This person wants people to do what they say.
Being very successful is important to this person. This person hopes people will recognize their achievements.
It is important to this person that the government protects them from all threats. This person wants the state to be strong so it can defend its citizens.
This person seeks every chance to have fun. It is important to this person to do things that give them pleasure.
It is important to this person to be loyal to their friends. This person wants to devote themselves to people close to them.
It is important to this person to follow rules even when no one is watching. This person believes they should always follow the law.
It is important to this person to be humble and modest. This person tries not to draw attention to themselves.
It is important to this person that every person in the world be treated justly. This person believes everyone deserves equal opportunities.
It is important to this person to enjoy life's pleasures. This person likes to indulge themselves.
